main event: An observer sighted a silver colored light in Springfield, Ohio, on 20 April 1968.
interesting points: The observed light appeared similar to a star and moved from the 5 to the 12 position,The sighting lasted between 5 to 10 minutes,The observer noted that the object had a dull white color with a metallic luster,There was no photograph associated with this report,The conclusion of the investigation was that the sighting was probably a satellite.
witness description: the observer who reported the sighting
